titlestmt.titleproper: International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAMAW), Lodge 1145; Records apap113
titlestmt.author: unprocessed

publicationstmt.publisher: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.unittitle: International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAMAW), Lodge 1145 Records
did.abstract: The collection includes vouchers, bills, correspondence, administrative records, and related material from the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers, Lodge 1145.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: The International Association of Machinists & Aerospace Workers (IAMAW), Lodge 1145, is based in Selkirk and DeWitt, NY.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection includes vouchers, bills, correspondence, administrative records, and related material from the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers, Lodge 1145.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: John Flaunders donated the collection to the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives in 2001 May.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. Portions of the collection may contain recent administrative records and/or personally identifiable information. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAMAW), Lodge 1145 Records, 1971-1998. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the IAMAW, Lodge 1145 Records).
